theme.name: Social
theme.bodyScript:
#set ($minWidthUnit = $core_v2_theme.GetUnitValue('minWidth', '670px', 10)) #set ($minWidth = $core_v2_utility.ParseInt($core_v2_utility.Replace($minWidthUnit, 'px', '')))
#set ($wrappingFormats = []) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-NoBorderWithNoSpacing'),CssClass='no-wrapper',IncludeHeader='false'}")) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-NoBorderWithSpacing'),CssClass='no-wrapper with-spacing',IncludeHeader='false'}")) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-NoBorderWithSpacingAndHeader'),CssClass='no-wrapping with-spacing with-header',IncludeHeader='true'}")) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-TopBorder'),CssClass='top-border with-spacing',IncludeHeader='false'}")) #set ($ignore = $wrappingFormats.Add("%{Name=$core_v2_language.GetResource('WrappingFormat-TopBorderAndHeader'),CssClass='top-border with-spacing with-header',IncludeHeader='true'}"))#set($options = "%{ WrappingFormats = $wrappingFormats, DefaultWrappingFormatWithHeader = 'top-border with-spacing with-header reponsive-1', DefaultWrappingFormatWithoutHeader = 'no-wrapper responsive-1'}") #set ($options = "%{ WrappingFormats = $wrappingFormats, DefaultWrappingFormatWithHeader = 'top-border with-spacing with-header reponsive-1', DefaultWrappingFormatWithoutHeader = 'no-wrapper responsive-1', LayoutReflowMinWidth = $minWidth }")
$context_v2_themeBody.RenderHeader($options) $context_v2_themeBody.RenderPage($options) $context_v2_themeBody.RenderFooter($options)
theme.configuration: <propertyGroup id="fontsAndColors" labelResourceName="fontsAndColors" visible="true"> <propertySubGroup id="fontsAndColorsGeneral" labelResourceName="colors" visible="true"> <property id="colorLabel" descriptionResourceName="fontsAndColorsDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="bannerColorLabel" labelResourceName="banners" descriptionResourceName="bannersDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="backgroundColor" labelResourceName="background" dataType="Color" /> <property id="foregroundColor" labelResourceName="foreground" dataType="Color" /> <property id="accentColor" labelResourceName="accent" descriptionResourceName="accentDesc" dataType="Color" /> <property id="linkFontColor" labelResourceName="link" descriptionResourceName="linkDesc" dataType="Color" /> <property id="contrast" labelResourceName="contrast" descriptionResourceName="contrastDesc" defaultValue="0" dataType="Double" inputType="range" min="-1" max="1" step=".1" rangeTicks="5" rangeLabel="true" rangeLabelFormat="Percent" /> </propertySubGroup> <propertySubGroup id="fontsAndColorsBaseFont" labelResourceName="fonts" visible="true"> <property id="fontsAndColorsBaseFontLabel" descriptionResourceName="fontsDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="baseFont" labelResourceName="font" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="system" labelResourceName="system" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="helvetica" labelResourceName="helvetica" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="source-sans-pro" labelResourceName="sourceSansPro" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="open-sans" labelResourceName="spenSans" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="fira-sans" labelResourceName="firaSans" propertiesToHide="baseFontCustom" /> <propertyValue value="custom" labelResourceName="customFont" propertiesToShow="baseFontCustom" /> </property> <property id="baseFontCustom" labelResourceName="custom" descriptionResourceName="customFontDesc" dataType="Url" allowedFileExtensions="woff" allowLocal="true" enablePreview="true" /> <property id="baseFontSizeValue" labelResourceName="size" dataType="Unit" /> <property id="baseFontWeight" labelResourceName="weight" dataType="Int"> <propertyValue value="100" labelText="100" /> <propertyValue value="200" labelText="200" /> <propertyValue value="300" labelText="300" /> <propertyValue value="400" labelText="400" /> <propertyValue value="500" labelText="500" /> <propertyValue value="600" labelText="600" /> <propertyValue value="700" labelText="700" /> <propertyValue value="800" labelText="800" /> <propertyValue value="900" labelText="900" /> </property> <property id="baseFontStyle" labelResourceName="style" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="normal" labelResourceName="normal" /> <propertyValue value="italic" labelResourceName="italic" /> </property> <property id="baseFontLineHeight" labelResourceName="lineHeight" dataType="Unit" /> </propertySubGroup> <propertySubGroup id="fontsAndColorsStateColors" labelResourceName="specialtyColors" visible="true"> <property id="fontsAndColorsStateColorsLabel" descriptionResourceName="specialtyColorsDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="statePositive" labelResourceName="positive" descriptionResourceName="positiveDesc" dataType="Color" /> <property id="statePending" labelResourceName="pending" descriptionResourceName="pendingDesc" dataType="Color" /> <property id="stateAttention" labelResourceName="attention" descriptionResourceName="attentionDesc" dataType="Color" /> <property id="stateNegative" labelResourceName="negative" descriptionResourceName="negativeDesc" dataType="Color" /> </propertySubGroup> </propertyGroup> <propertyGroup id="favicon" labelResourceName="favicon" visible="true"> <property id="favicon" labelResourceName="favicon" descriptionResourceName="faviconDesc" dataType="Url" enablePreview="true" allowLocal="true" allowRemote="false" /> </propertyGroup> <propertyGroup id="dimensions" labelResourceName="dimensions" visible="true"> <property id="layoutsLabel" labelResourceName="layouts" descriptionResourceName="layoutsDesc" dataType="String" editable="false" visible="true" /> <property id="minWidth" labelResourceName="minimumWidth" descriptionResourceName="minimumWidthDesc" dataType="Unit" /> <property id="maxWidth" labelResourceName="maximumWidth" descriptionResourceName="maximumWidthDesc" dataType="Unit" /> <property id="siteHeader" labelResourceName="siteHeaderBehavior" descriptionResourceName="siteHeaderBehaviorDesc" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="adaptive" labelResourceName="siteHeaderAdaptiveDesc" /> <propertyValue value="static" labelResourceName="siteHeaderStaticDesc" /> </property> <property id="sidebar" labelResourceName="sidebarBehavior" descriptionResourceName="sidebarBehaviorDesc" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="adaptive" labelResourceName="sidebarBehaviorAdaptive" /> <propertyValue value="static" labelResourceName="sidebarBehaviorStatic" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
theme.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="accent">Accent</resource> <resource name="accentDesc">Used for buttons, borders, and some links</resource> <resource name="attention">Attention State</resource> <resource name="attentionDesc">Used when indicating both warning states as well as toggled active button states.</resource> <resource name="background">Background</resource> <resource name="banners">Banners</resource> <resource name="bannersDesc">Group, and blog banner color palettes can be selected directly within the configuration of those widgets.</resource> <resource name="colors">Colors</resource> <resource name="contrast">Contrast adjustment</resource> <resource name="contrastDesc">Contrast adjustments influence generated colors.</resource> <resource name="custom">Custom</resource> <resource name="customFont">Custom Font</resource> <resource name="customFontDesc">Web Open Font Format (WOFF) File</resource> <resource name="dimensions">Layout</resource> <resource name="favicon">Favicon</resource> <resource name="faviconDesc">The favicon displays on browser tabs and home screens. PNG format and high resolution (256x256) are recommended.</resource> <resource name="firaSans">Fira Sans</resource> <resource name="font">Font</resource> <resource name="fonts">Fonts</resource> <resource name="fontsAndColors">Fonts and Colors</resource> <resource name="fontsAndColorsDesc">These colors represent a baseline and will be slightly adjusted by the theme as necessary.</resource> <resource name="fontsDesc">These font settings represent a baseline and will be adjusted by the theme as necessary.</resource> <resource name="foreground">Foreground</resource> <resource expand.</resource> <resource name="minimumWidth">Minimum Width</resource> <resource name="minimumWidthDesc">Minimum width, in pixels, beyond which the layout will transition to a single-column mobile-friendly layout.</resource> <resource name="negative">Negative</resource> <resource name="negativeDesc">Used when indicating problematic states such as rejecting an answer.</resource> <resource <resource name="positive">Positive State</resource> <resource name="positiveDesc">Used when indicating approved states such as verified answers.</resource> <resource name="sidebarBehavior">Sidebar
